name: MPTCE
tagline: The Myoelectric Personal Training and Control Environment
body:
### Welcome to the home page of MPTCE

MPTCE is an application that aims to enable people to use surface electromyography data acquisition devices at home for biofeedback training.

* Download the [latest installer (v0.2)](https://github.com/mgcarmueja/MPTCE/blob/installer/v0.2/MPTCE_0.2.zip?raw=true)
* Check out the [README file for the latest version (0.2)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mgcarmueja/MPTCE/0.2/README) for more information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
